org.jasig.cas.authentication

Class FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLConnectionSocketFactory
      • org.jasig.cas.authentication.FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.conn.socket.ConnectionSocketFactory, org.apache.http.conn.socket.LayeredConnectionSocketFactory

    @Component(value="trustStoreSslSocketFactory")
public final class FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory
extends org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLConnectionSocketFactory
    The SSL socket factory that loads the SSL context from a custom truststore file strictly used ssl handshakes for proxy authentication.
    Since:
    4.1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLConnectionSocketFactory

        ALLOW_ALL_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER, BROWSER_COMPATIBLE_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER, SSL, SSLV2, STRICT_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER, TLS

      Instantiates a new trusted proxy authentication trust store ssl socket factory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory

        @Autowired
public FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory(@Value(value="${http.client.truststore.file:classpath:truststore.jks}")
                                        java.io.File trustStoreFile,
                                        @Value(value="${http.client.truststore.psw:changeit}")
                                        java.lang.String trustStorePassword)
        Instantiates a new trusted proxy authentication trust store ssl socket factory. Defaults to TLSv1 and SSLConnectionSocketFactory.BROWSER_COMPATIBLE_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER for the supported protocols and hostname verification.
        Parameters:
        trustStoreFile - the trust store file
        trustStorePassword - the trust store password

      • FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory

        public FileTrustStoreSslSocketFactory(java.io.File trustStoreFile,
                              java.lang.String trustStorePassword,
                              java.lang.String trustStoreType)
        Instantiates a new trusted proxy authentication trust store ssl socket factory.
        Parameters:
        trustStoreFile - the trust store file
        trustStorePassword - the trust store password
        trustStoreType - the trust store type
